mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community( comm_writer, file_name, comm_title, comm_content ) VALUES( #{empCode}, #{fileName}, #{articleTitle}, #{articleContent} )
INSERT INTO notice( notice_writer, file_name, notice_title, notice_content ) VALUES( #{empCode}, #{fileName}, #{articleTitle}, #{articleContent} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.comm_num commNum, c.comm_writer commEmpCode, e.emp_kor_name commWriter, f.original_file_name commFileName, c.comm_title commTitle, c.comm_content commContent, DATE_FORMAT(c.comm_create_date, '%y-%m-%d') AS commCreateDate, DATE_FORMAT(c.comm_update_date, '%y-%m-%d') AS commUpdateDate, c.comm_count commCount FROM community c LEFT OUTER JOIN emp e ON c.comm_writer = e.emp_code LEFT OUTER JOIN forum_file f ON c.file_name = f.file_name ORDER BY c.comm_num DESC LIMIT 0, 5

SELECT n.notice_num noticeNum, n.notice_writer noticeEmpCode, e.emp_kor_name noticeWriter, f.original_file_name noticeFileName, n.notice_title noticeTitle, n.notice_content noticeContent, DATE_FORMAT(n.notice_create_date, '%y-%m-%d') AS noticeCreateDate, DATE_FORMAT(n.notice_update_date, '%y-%m-%d') AS noticeUpdateDate, n.notice_count noticeCount FROM notice n LEFT OUTER JOIN emp e ON n.notice_writer = e.emp_code LEFT OUTER JOIN forum_file f ON n.file_name = f.file_name ORDER BY n.notice_num DESC LIMIT 0, 5

SELECT c.comm_num commNum, c.comm_writer commEmpCode, e.emp_kor_name commWriter, f.original_file_name commFileName, c.comm_title commTitle, c.comm_content commContent, DATE_FORMAT(c.comm_create_date, '%y-%m-%d') AS commCreateDate, DATE_FORMAT(c.comm_update_date, '%y-%m-%d') AS commUpdateDate, c.comm_count commCount FROM community c LEFT OUTER JOIN emp e ON c.comm_writer = e.emp_code LEFT OUTER JOIN forum_file f ON c.file_name = f.file_name ORDER BY c.comm_num DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT n.notice_num noticeNum, n.notice_writer noticeEmpCode, e.emp_kor_name noticeWriter, f.original_file_name noticeFileName, n.notice_title noticeTitle, n.notice_content noticeContent, DATE_FORMAT(n.notice_create_date, '%y-%m-%d') AS noticeCreateDate, DATE_FORMAT(n.notice_update_date, '%y-%m-%d') AS noticeUpdateDate, n.notice_count noticeCount FROM notice n LEFT OUTER JOIN emp e ON n.notice_writer = e.emp_code LEFT OUTER JOIN forum_file f ON n.file_name = f.file_name ORDER BY n.notice_num DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT c.comm_num commNum, c.comm_writer commEmpCode, e.emp_kor_name commWriter, f.original_file_name commFileName, c.comm_title commTitle, c.comm_content commContent, DATE_FORMAT(c.comm_create_date, '%y.%m.%d %H:%i:%S') AS commCreateDate, DATE_FORMAT(c.comm_update_date, '%y.%m.%d %H:%i:%S') AS commUpdateDate FROM community c LEFT OUTER JOIN emp e ON c.comm_writer = e.emp_code LEFT OUTER JOIN forum_file f ON c.file_name = f.file_name WHERE c.comm_num = #{boardNum}

SELECT n.notice_num noticeNum, n.notice_writer noticeEmpCode, e.emp_kor_name noticeWriter, f.original_file_name noticeFileName, n.notice_title noticeTitle, n.notice_content noticeContent, DATE_FORMAT(n.notice_create_date, '%y.%m.%d %H:%i:%S') AS noticeCreateDate, DATE_FORMAT(n.notice_update_date, '%y.%m.%d %H:%i:%S') AS noticeUpdateDate FROM notice n LEFT OUTER JOIN emp e ON n.notice_writer = e.emp_code LEFT OUTER JOIN forum_file f ON n.file_name = f.file_name WHERE n.notice_num = #{boardNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE community SET( comm_title = #{articleTitle}, comm_content = #{articleContent}, comm_update_date = NOW() ) WHERE comm_num = #{boardNum} AND comm_writer = #{empCode}
UPDATE notice SET( notice_title = #{articleTitle}, notice_content = #{articleContent}, notice_update_date = NOW() ) WHERE notice_num = #{boardNum} AND notice_writer = #{empCode}
